Resume

Please click here to view my resume.

EDUCATION

The University of Chicago, Chicago, IL
Bachelor of Arts in Linguistics, June 2019
Honors and Grants: Phi Beta Kappa, Leonard Bloomfield Prize in Linguistics, PRISM Research Grant

RESEARCH EXPERIENCE

University of Chicago Department of Psychology, Chicago, IL
Research Assistant, June 2019 – August 2020
• Developed survey battery in Qualtrics to study the effects of civic engagement on college students
• Collected and analyzed data from 20+ participants using Excel and R to isolate mediating factors
• Facilitated lab operations; taught graduate students to use software and resolved technical issues
Undergraduate Research Assistant, February 2018 – June 2019
• Designed two experiments—collected and/or created 120+ image and sound stimuli, edited these stimuli in linguistic software, and wrote computer scripts to present study tasks
• Created visual summaries of data sets and presented these findings at a symposium

EDITORIAL AND WRITING EXPERIENCE

Makom, the University of Chicago’s Undergraduate Journal of Jewish Thought, Chicago, IL
Editor-In-Chief, August 2018—June 2019
• Revived a journal that had ceased publishing and created a sustainable organizational framework
• Reviewed and edited 20+ academic articles, poetry, and fiction pertaining to Jewish thought
The Chicago Maroon, Chicago, IL
Associate Editor (formerly Staff Writer and Contributor), October 2015 — March 2017
• Authored 5+ news articles each academic quarter on topics including student government, administrative and academic developments, student life, and crime
• Edited 25+ per week articles to fact-check, clarify information, and refine writing for publishing

TECHNICAL SKILLS

• Languages: Hebrew (fluent), French (working proficiency)
• Computer: SPSS, Excel, PowerPoint, Word, Qualtrics, LaTeX, R, Python (basic), C (basic)
